extDescription.message: Quickly search the web with variables inside the query for those pesky repeating lookups.

noValuesSet.message: You have no values set. Go to the settings page to add new ones.

notificationMessage.message: Your settings have been successfully saved. Click to dismiss this notification.

queryHelpDescription.message:
Sadly Chrome offers no way of accessing the query URLs of configured search engines so you may have to specify your own.
You can find your personal settings over at chrome://settings/searchEngines.
This extension takes the query URL and replaces the characters %s with your processed query.
Take a look at these example queries from big search engines:

noVariables.message: There are currently no variables set.
